segments.text: I need to buy some fruit .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All the fruit are pretty fresh here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Give me one kilo of those , please . Do you have any fresh plums ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , we do . They are eight yuan per kilo .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's a bit too expensive . We can get it for six yuan in the shop next here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Take much and you can have them six yuan per kilo .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sounds reasonable . I'll take three kilos .
segments.speaker: S1
